spec_data.Name: dreampie
spec_data.License: GPLv3+ and LGPLv2+ and BSD and Python and Copyright only
spec_data.Description:
DreamPie was designed from the ground up for an interactive Python
experience. It features a window divided into a history box and a code box,
automatic completion, automatic display of function arguments and
documentation, a result history that can be saved as HTML, automatic folding
of long outputs, etc.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 03:49:58 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A graphical cross-platform interactive Python shell
